title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Official Characters Trailer
description:
Meet Lloyd, Rean, C, and their allies in this latest trailer for The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie. 

Though they march on different paths, the destines of Lloyd, Rean, "C," and their allies are about to intertwine. Zemuria will forever be changed by the trails they walk.

The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie will be available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and PC on July 7, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Scream VI Review
description:
Scream VI reviewed by Amelia Emberwing.
Emotions and brutality are at an all-time high in Scream 6, setting it up to be the best sequel in the franchise yet. Though it does ultimately fumble the reason for Sidney Prescott’s absence, RadioSilence has officially proven that there’s a future for the franchise with or without its original final girl by giving us strong connections to the new Core Four.

title: Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucer - Official Nintendo Switch Release Date Trailer
description:
Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucer will be available on Nintendo Switch on March 16, 2023. Check out the latest trailer for this shoot 'em up game. 

Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers is a spaceship shooter with 2D gameplay and 3D environments. The game features a combination of a fast-paced shooting experience and 1950s sci-fi movies aesthetic with live-action cutscenes.

#IGN #Gaming

title: WWE 2K23 - Official MyFaction Trailer
description:
Watch the latest WWE 2K23 trailer to see the upgrades and additions coming to MyFaction, including online multiplayer, Live Events and more.

Collect and upgrade cards of WWE Superstars and Legends to build your dream faction and compete for global dominance.

WWE 2K23 will be available on March 17, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #WWE

title: Bayonetta Origins: Cereza and the Lost Demon - Official Story Trailer
description:
Watch the latest trailer for Bayonetta Origins: Cereza and the Lost Demon to learn more about the story and get another look at the forbidden Avalon Forest and more from this upcoming game. Bayonetta Origins: Cereza and the Lost Demon will be available on Nintendo Switch on March 17, 2023. A demo is available now on the Nintendo eShop.

Long before this trainee of the dark arts would come to be called Bayonetta, she took a fateful journey into the forbidden Avalon Forest. Alongside her was Cheshire, her very first demon, possessing Cereza’s stuffed toy. Play as both Cereza and Cheshire and search through the treacherous forest to look for the power to save Cereza’s mother.

#IGN #Gaming #Bayonetta

title: PlayStation VR2 - Official Accolades Trailer
description:
See what some critics are saying about PS VR2, available now.

#IGN #VR #PlayStation

title: Fortnite Tips & Tricks With 100 Thieves' CouRage and SydSoGood
description:
Cheez-It's very own Cheez is ready to put all the Fortnite lessons to use...by shoutcasting 100 Thieves' CouRage's Let's Play of Zero Build Fortnite Solos alongside Sydnee Goodman. Along the way, CouRage will teach everyone the do's and dont's of Fortnite Battle Royale.

Presented by Cheez-It.

title: Wargroove 2 - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Check out the announcement trailer for Wargroove 2 for a peek at the world, factions, and more from this upcoming strategy game sequel coming to PC and Nintendo Switch. 

In Wargroove 2, trouble stirs on the shores of Aurania. An ambitious new faction has unearthed forbidden relics capable of catastrophic consequences. But how far will they go to achieve glory? Take to the battlefield, sea, and sky with a cast of new Commanders, using your wits to wage turn-based war.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Sons of the Forest - All Endings (Early Access)
description:
Want to see all Sons of the Forest endings? There are three distinct conclusions to be found in the Sons of the Forest Early Access release! The Good, Bad, and the Sons of the Forest Secret Ending, but how do you get them? Here's how to unlock each Sons of the Forest ending, and how each variation differs depending on your relationship with Kelvin and Virginia.

#IGN #Gaming #SonsOfTheForest

title: How Marvel Created the Quantum Realm for Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
description:
The Quantum Realm is one of the most unique and bizarre places in the MCU, so here's a look behind the scenes showing how they created such a wondrous and mind-bending setting for Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania. Hear from director Peyton Reed, Production Visual Effects Supervisor Jesse James Chisholm, and actors Paul Rudd (Ant-Man/Scott Lang), Michael Douglas (Dr. Hank Pym), Evangeline Lily (Wasp/Hope), and Kathryn Newton (Cassie Lang) about the various technologies and techniques used to bring this secret universe to life.

#IGN #Marvel

title: Starfield - Official Release Date Announcement
description:
Watch the latest teaser and announcement video for Starfield for the reveal that the game will be available on September 6, 2023. In the video, game director Todd Howard also reveals a Starfield Direct will happen on June 11, 2023, in which the team will showcase a deep dive into this upcoming RPG from Bethesda Game Studios.

#IGN #Gaming #Starfield

title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves - Official Characters Behind the Scenes (2023) Chris Pine
description:
Meet the characters of Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves in this latest featurette for the upcoming movie. Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves stars Chris Pine, Michelle Rodriguez, Regé-Jean Page, Justice Smith, Sophia Lillis, Chloe Coleman, Daisy Head, and Hugh Grant.

A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.  Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves brings the rich world and playful spirit of the legendary roleplaying game to the big screen in a hilarious and action-packed adventure.

Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves is produced by Jeremy Latcham, p.g.a., Brian Goldner, and Nick Meyer. Denis L. Stewart, Jonathan Goldstein, John Francis Daley, Chris Pine, Zev Foreman, and Greg Mooradian serve as executive producers. The screenplay is by Jonathan Goldstein & John Francis Daley, and Michael Gilio. The story is by Chris McKay and Michael Gilio.

Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves, directed by Jonathan Goldstein and John Francis Daley, opens in theaters on March 31, 2023.

#IGN #Movies #DungeonsAndDragons

title: MPower - Official TV Spot (2023) Zoë Saldaña, Angela Bassett
description:
Check out the trailer for MPower, a four-episode series spotlighting several of the MCU’s most inspirational women heroes. MPower is now streaming on Disney+. 

MPower consists of four stand-alone episodes. From Carol Danvers and Wanda Maximoff to the women of Wakanda and The Guardians of the Galaxy, the series unpacks the journeys of these characters from their birth in Marvel Comics to the MCU and beyond. Archival footage, imaginative animation and candid interviews work in tandem to profile how these characters and the women behind their success have impacted fans around the world.

Zoë Saldaña is featured in episode four and serves as an Executive Producer of the series alongside Cisely and Mariel Saldana for Cinestar Pictures.

#IGN #Marvel #MCU

title: Wayfinder Looks to Reconnect With the Spirit of MMOs Past
description: We were quite impressed with our first hands-on for Wayfinder, an upcoming MMO that looks to take the genre back to its World of Warcraft/Guild Wars/Final Fantasy XI heyday. Previewed on PC by Luke Winkie.

title: Forever Skies - Official The Research Station Gameplay Trailer
description:
Watch the trailer for a deep dive into The Research Station, an upgrade system that unlocks more advanced technologies needed to survive the harsh world of Forever Skies, an upcoming first-person, sci-fi survival game. 

Forever Skies will be coming to Steam Early Access in 2023 and later to consoles.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Paint - Official Trailer (2023) Owen Wilson
description:
In Paint, Owen Wilson portrays Carl Nargle, Vermont’s #1 public television painter who is convinced he has it all: a signature perm, custom van, and fans hanging on his every stroke… until a younger, better artist steals everything (and everyone) Carl loves.

#IGN #Movies

title: Dungeons & Dragons - Official "Honor Among Thieves" Gallery Overview
description: Christopher Perkins talks with Todd Kenreck about designing the “Thieves’ Gallery,” which includes a handful of characters from the film “Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves” presented as NPCs you can include in your D&D campaigns.
